item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the March meeting of the Greater Boston NLP group.

This monthâ€™s topic: Introduction to Hypnosis

This will be an introduction to hypnosis for all interested. Remember that one of the major resources that NLP is modeled after was Milton Erickson, one of the top hypnotherapists of his time.

This will introduce the basics of hypnosis, what it is, what it isn't, a little history, what are the key factors, and we will all experience a simple induction and WONDERFUL relaxation. We will also highlight differences between NLP and hypnosis.

Prepare for a wonderful night's sleep following the meetup!



Kevin

Kevin Martin
NLP Master Practitioner, Hypnotist
Positive Effects
Methuen, MA
(978) 273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com----------------------------------
Helping people to help themselves.
item.how_to_find_us: Go straight back to the large studio (after 7pm)

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group
